title: PBE Requirements
body: I got banned for 2 weeks this season, but that was months ago and I'm honor level 5 now. Am I still eligible to have a PBE account? It keeps saying "Something went wrong. Please refresh the page and try again."

replies.body: You're still eligible! That signup page just has a HECKIN lot of traffic with all the players trying to signup right now, so give it a little time and try later if you can. You're welcome to keep trying, but this kind of thing is only going to be fixed with time.
